comment: There is just too much chaos for my taste. Not much else to say.

A fun theme and interesting light tactical game. A pretty unique combat mechanics of spinning cards and selecting corners is a nice change, if a bit fiddly. The hidden cards gives a nice memory aspect, but can confuse players with the movement rules.

Better than Stratego, plays more quickly, amusing pictures on cards... A lot of luck involved, of course.

Currently have:
Krokonos & Pungs
Zools & Zyons
Warys & Boarix
Rhinogoths & Monkus

Fun hybrid of chess-like gameplay & "Memory" cards. Like the cartoonish art style of the cards. Have Europa decks(Rhinogoths vs Monkus/Warus vs Boarix) & Bigear decks(Zools vs Zyons/Krokokos vs Pungs). All US edition.

traded 7/'21
This game is extremely average. Of all the games I have played this is one of them

I thought this was great- spatially interesting, a clever battle system, the different decks all have interesting personalities. if you dislike the memory element, you can always leave cards face up once they are revealed. I really dig the aesthetic too. A hidden gem if you ask me.
Picked up four decks off Ebay, Beautiful artwork great mechanics, just sleeve em and keep em all . What a great forgotten treasure.together

This is my favorite game I have ever played. It is highly addicting and A LOT of fun. I really want to collect all of the decks, so please contact me if you have any decks other than the Europa Decks, Bigear Decks and the Kasorenes/Tugeshes Deck.
